commit.message:
typeck.c (type_after_usual_arithmetic_conversions): Prefer a SIZETYPE to a non-SIZETYPE.

        * typeck.c (type_after_usual_arithmetic_conversions): Prefer a
        SIZETYPE to a non-SIZETYPE.
